name: VIDEO_SOURCE_REMOTE_VIDEO_STATE_CHANGED
description:
Occurs when the remote video state changes.This callback does not work properly when the number of users (in the voice/video call channel) or hosts (in the live streaming channel) in the channel exceeds 17.
          The callback for the second instance.

parameters.uid: The ID of the remote user whose video state changes.

parameters.state: The state of the remote video, see REMOTE_VIDEO_STATE.

parameters.reason: The reason for the remote video state change, see REMOTE_VIDEO_STATE_REASON.

parameters.elapsed: Time elapsed (ms) from the local user calling the videoSourceJoinChannel method until the SDK triggers this callback.
